pages.title: Entropy Sink
pages.text: The <item>Entropy Sink/$ is the main way of destroying <thing>$(l:intro/technomancy)temporal entropy/$. It can destroy a massive amount of <thing>$(l:intro/technomancy)temporal entropy/$ each tick (2,500; more than you are likely to ever produce).$(br2)In order to work, it must be placed directly over a (vanilla) beacon. It can be

placed floating in the air several blocks above. The beacon does not have to be active, but the <item>entropy sink/$ will not block the beacon beam.$(br2)Use <item>$(l:technomancy/node)Entropy Nodes/$ to get <thing>$(l:intro/technomancy)temporal entropy/$ from machines to the <item>entropy sink/$.$(br2)The <item>entropy sink/$ can share the beacon with a <item>$(l:technomancy/beacon_harness)Beacon Harness/$.
